sub_topic: Prove that the symmetric difference of two sets is distributive over union.
message_1: Let A = {1, 2, 3, 4} and B = {3, 4, 5, 6} be two sets. Find the symmetric difference of (A $\bigtriangleup$ B) $\cup$ B and (A $\cup$ B) $\bigtriangleup$ B. Verify that the result satisfies the distributive property of the symmetric difference over union.
